name: Memory (itch) (Seskon)
description:
Game created for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 with the theme "On/Off". The approach to the theme was that I animated things that turn on and off. This game is a simple Memory game with 33 diffrent cards. Each card is a 84x48 pixel animation. 

There are 2 playmodes:

  • 1 Player: the game gives you a random card each turn that you need to find. The number of turns are counted. Try to find all matches with as few rounds as possible.
  • 2 Player: classic memory, the player with the most matching cards wins

Controles

  • move up: W or Numpad 8
  • move down: S or Numpad 2
  • move Left: A or Numpad 4
  • move right: D or Numpad 6
  • Confirm: E or Numpad 5
  • Cancle: Q or Numpad 0

Note: there is currently no way to quit out of a running game, so just reload the page and there is also no Sound
